description.value: An extension to provide a relation from a hypersensitivity intolerance to the hypersensitivity intolerance which was used to create a new, modified registration (as a result of changing one or more data elements or inactivating the hypersensitivity intolerance), or from a reaction to the underlying hypersensitivity intolerance.

purpose.value: This extension represents the RelationHypersensitivityIntolerance concept for implementations following the information standard [CiO](https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/Landingspagina_Contra-indicaties_en_Overgevoeligheden).

copyright.value: Copyright and related rights waived via CC0, https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. This does not apply to information from third parties, for example a medical terminology system. The implementer alone is responsible for identifying and obtaining any necessary licenses or authorizations to utilize third party IP in connection with the specification or otherwise.

definition.value: Relation from a hypersensitivity intolerance to the hypersensitivity intolerance which was used to create a new, modified registration (as a result of changing one or more data elements or inactivating the hypersensitivity intolerance), or from a reaction to the underlying hypersensitivity intolerance.
